name: Black Leather Silver Chain Multi Spike Ring to Wrist Armor Slave Bracelet
description:
METAL CHAIN LINK SPIKE SLAVE BRACELET

SILVER MULTI SPIKES

BLACK LEATHER CUFF BRACELET & RING W/ 2 DIFFERENT BUTTON SNAPS FOR SIZE ADJUSTMENT (BRACELET WILL ADJUST AT 7.5" & 8", RING WILL ADJUST TO FIT A SIZE6/7 OR 8/9)

CHAIN & RING CAN BE REMOVED AND YOU CAN WEAR IT JUST AS A CUFF BRACELET IF YOU PREFER

BRACELET MEASURES 1.5" WIDE, COOL & UNIQUE DESIGN

Please feel free to ask any questions prior to ordering. All sales are final unless grossly misrepresented. Descriptions are to the best of my ability. If for any reason you are unhappy with your purchase, please contact me immediately with concerns. All items are kept in a smoke-free, pet-free home and stored in a large boutique-style walk-in closet. Items are inspected prior to shipping.

AS WITH ALL FASHION JEWELRY our pieces are costume jewelry so please expect normal wear and tear associated with costume jewelry. To preserve the life of your jewelry, Items should be wrapped and stored in a safe place such as a jewelry box. ALL SALES FINAL.

name: Double Lion Head Bangle Bracelet
description:
Have an Instinct for style? Go wild for this lion head cuff bracelet, which opens easily via spring hinge and wraps around your wrist in a bypass design. 

It's beautifully detailed with an epoxy enamel print, black acrylic stone eyes, and gleaming rhinestone accents throughout.

Rhodium
Hinged 
Fits most wrist
Measures approximately 3/4"W at widest point

name: JUNGLE LOVE - Black and White Crystalized Cuff
description:
Go wild for sparkles. Our Jungle Love crystal-encrusted cuff adds exotic glamour to every look. Whether its casual or an evening look, add some flair with our gorgeous metal cuff. 

3 1/8 inches wide
Gold tone
Black & Clear Resin Acrylic 
Lead & Nickel Compliant 
Zebra Print Design
